title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.273 - Psychiatric inpatient service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.273 - Psychiatric inpatient service

State Regulations

The care of psychiatric inpatients; the hospital must
also employ specially trained personnel to staff this service, and at least one
psychiatrist must be on the medical staff. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.273

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
